name: Apps People
tagline: Helping develop apps that turn into businesses.
description:
In 2013, Apps People founder, Stuart Kidd publicly listed the first mobile app development and financing company on the ASX.
Apps People has years of experience with iPhone and Android development. In fact, we've been doing what we do since 2010.
We strive to deliver amazing apps to our clients and work with them from ideation to launch, giving them valuable advice each step of the way.
